text: Doris Bunte (July 2, 1933 - February 15, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. She was born in Boston, Massachusetts. From 1973 to 1984, Bunte was a member of the Massachusetts House of Representatives. Bunte died on February 15, 2021 in Boston from cancer at the age of 87.A groundbreaking Black woman in state and city government, Doris Bunte dies at 87 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Cancer deaths in Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Doris Bunte
